title: Rahu Transit in the 11th House for Scorpio Ascendant
summary: When Rahu transits the 11th house for Scorpio Ascendant, gains, networks, and ambitions expand rapidly through unconventional channels. This phase attracts influential circles, foreign connections, and large platforms that amplify reach and income potential. Desires multiply, pushing you to chase bigger goals and visibility. However, overexpectation, opportunistic alliances, or ethical compromises can create instability. Clear priorities and integrity are essential. When guided wisely, this transit delivers substantial gains, strategic friendships, and fulfillment of long-held aspirations.

sections.title: Core Personality
points: Strong desire for growth and recognition

sections.title: Career
points: Success via tech, media, or foreign links

closing: This Rahu transit magnifies gains and ambitions. With integrity and focus, it fulfills goals and builds powerful networks for lasting success.
